title: Chat not working
body: I upgraded to new client, used it for few hours and then got back to old one because I found new one complicated to use. Now I can't connect to chat. Why? It worked on new client.

replies.body:
It sounds like you have a poor connection to the chat servers. This is often caused by conflicting network settings are your local network, so I'd like you to work through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if anything changes.

Let me know the results.
